1.name: The Addams Family
1.description: Con artists plan to fleece an eccentric family using an accomplice who claims to be their long-lost uncle.

2.name: The Silence of the Lambs
2.description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

3.name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
3.description: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son, John Connor, from a more advanced and powerful cyborg.

4.name: Point Break
4.description: An F.B.I. Agent goes undercover to catch a gang of surfers who may be bank robbers.

5.name: Hook
5.description: When Captain Hook kidnaps his children, an adult Peter Pan must return to Neverland and reclaim his youthful spirit in order to challenge his old enemy.

6.name: Cape Fear
6.description: A convicted rapist, released from prison after serving a fourteen-year sentence, stalks the family of the lawyer who originally defended him.

7.name: Yuk po tuen: Tau ching bo gam
7.description: A recently married scholar goes on a quest for knowledge of other people's wives, based on his philosophical differences with the Sack Monk. He encounters the Flying Thief, who agrees to ...                See full summary »

8.name: Thelma & Louise
8.description: Two best friends set out on an adventure, but it soon turns around to a terrifying escape from being hunted by the police, as these two girls escape for the crimes they committed.

9.name: Boyz n the Hood
9.description: Follows the lives of three young males living in the Crenshaw ghetto of Los Angeles, dissecting questions of race, relationships, violence and future prospects.

10.name: Beauty and the Beast
10.description: A prince cursed to spend his days as a hideous monster sets out to regain his humanity by earning a young woman's love.

11.name: Robin Hood: Prince of Thieves
11.description: When Robin and his Moorish companion come to England and the tyranny of the Sheriff of Nottingham, he decides to fight back as an outlaw.

12.name: My Own Private Idaho
12.description: Two best friends living on the streets of Portland as hustlers embark on a journey of self discovery and find their relationship stumbling along the way.

13.name: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead
13.description: Five siblings are left alone all summer when their mom leaves town and the evil babysitter bites the dust.

14.name: My Girl
14.description: A young girl, on the threshold of her teen years, finds her life turning upside down, when she is accompanied by an unlikely friend.

15.name: Fried Green Tomatoes
15.description: A housewife who is unhappy with her life befriends an old lady in a nursing home and is enthralled by the tales she tells of people she used to know.

16.name: JFK
16.description: New Orleans District Attorney Jim Garrison discovers there's more to the Kennedy assassination than the official story.

17.name: Necessary Roughness
17.description: Due to NCAA sanctions, the Texas State University Fightin' Armadillos must form a football team from their actual student body, with no scholarships to help, to play their football schedule.

18.name: City Slickers
18.description: On the verge of turning 40, an unhappy Manhattan yuppie is roped into joining his two friends on a cattle drive in the southwest.

19.name: Paprika
19.description: A young country girl comes to town and works in a brothel in order to help her fiance get the money to start his own business. "Paprika" is the name given to her by the madam.

20.name: Star Trek VI: The Undiscovered Country
20.description: On the eve of retirement, Kirk and McCoy are charged with assassinating the Klingon High Chancellor and imprisoned. The Enterprise crew must help them escape to thwart a conspiracy aimed at sabotaging the last best hope for peace.

21.name: Drop Dead Fred
21.description: A young woman finds her already unstable life rocked by the presence of a rambunctious imaginary friend from childhood.

22.name: Nothing But Trouble
22.description: A businessman and his friends are captured by a sadistic judge and his equally odd family in the backwoods of a bizarre mansion.

23.name: Career Opportunities
23.description: Jim is the dorky son of a local cement contractor who lives at home and has no direction. Josie is the gorgeous daughter of a wealthy businessman who dreams of leaving town. They find they have a lot in common.

24.name: The Doors
24.description: The story of the famous and influential 1960s rock band The Doors and its lead singer and composer, Jim Morrison, from his days as a UCLA film student in Los Angeles, to his untimely death in Paris, France at age 27 in 1971.

25.name: Backdraft
25.description: Two Chicago firefighter brothers, who don't get along, have to work together while a dangerous arsonist is on the loose.

26.name: The Rocketeer
26.description: A young pilot stumbles onto a prototype jetpack that allows him to become a high flying masked hero.

27.name: Sleeping with the Enemy
27.description: A young woman fakes her own death in an attempt to escape her nightmarish marriage, but discovers it is impossible to elude her controlling husband.

28.name: Naked Lunch
28.description: After developing an addiction to the substance he uses to kill bugs, an exterminator accidentally kills his wife, and becomes involved in a secret government plot being orchestrated by giant bugs in a port town in North Africa.

29.name: Barton Fink
29.description: A renowned New York playwright is enticed to California to write for the movies and discovers the hellish truth of Hollywood.

30.name: Father of the Bride
30.description: With his oldest daughter's wedding approaching, a father finds himself reluctant to let go.

31.name: The Last Boy Scout
31.description: A private detective's protected female witness is murdered, prompting him and the victim's boyfriend to investigate the crime that leads to a corrupt politician and a crooked football team owner.

32.name: Return to the Blue Lagoon
32.description: In this sequel to The Blue Lagoon (1980), two children are stranded on a beautiful island in the South Pacific. With no adults to guide them, the two make a simple life together and eventually become suntanned teenagers in love.

33.name: The People Under the Stairs
33.description: Two adults and a juvenile break into a house occupied by a brother and sister and their stolen children. There, they must fight for their lives.

34.name: La belle noiseuse
34.description: The former famous painter Frenhofer revisits an abandoned project using the girlfriend of a young visiting artist. Questions about truth, life, and artistic limits are explored.

35.name: Hot Shots!
35.description: A parody of Top Gun (1986) in which a talented but unstable fighter pilot must overcome the ghosts of his father and save a mission sabotaged by greedy weapons manufacturers.

36.name: Ernest Scared Stupid
36.description: Ernest accidentally unleashes an ugly troll that plots to transform children into wooden dolls in the town of Briarville, Missouri.

37.name: The Fisher King
37.description: A former radio DJ, suicidally despondent because of a terrible mistake he made, finds redemption in helping a deranged homeless man who was an unwitting victim of that mistake.

38.name: Child's Play 3
38.description: Chucky returns for revenge against Andy, the young boy who defeated him, and now a teenager living in a military academy.

39.name: Double Impact
39.description: Twin brothers are separated when their parents are murdered but 25 years later they re-unite in order to avenge their parents' death.

40.name: The Man in the Moon
40.description: A coming of age story set in the south of the U.S. when Elvis was King.

41.name: Freddy's Dead: The Final Nightmare
41.description: Dream-haunting Freddy Krueger returns once again to prowl the nightmares of Springwood's last surviving teenager, and of a woman whose personal connection to Krueger may mean his doom.

42.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II: The Secret of the Ooze
42.description: The Turtles and the Shredder battle once again, this time for the last canister of the ooze that created the Turtles, with which Shredder wants to unleash an army of new mutants.

43.name: New Jack City
43.description: A crime lord ascends to power and becomes megalomaniacal while a maverick police detective vows to stop him.

44.name: Oscar
44.description: A gangster attempts to keep the promise he made to his dying father: that he would give up his life of crime and "go straight".

45.name: Dutch
45.description: To get to know his girlfriend's son, a working-class good guy volunteers to pick him up from a prep school, only to learn that her son isn't the nicest kid.

46.name: What About Bob?
46.description: A successful psychotherapist loses his mind after one of his most dependent patients, an obsessive-compulsive neurotic, tracks him down during his family vacation.

47.name: The Commitments
47.description: When Jimmy Rabbitte wants to start a band, he has open auditions at his house.

48.name: Doc Hollywood
48.description: A young doctor on his way across the country to a job interview crashes his car in a small town and is sentenced to work for several days at the town hospital.

49.name: Bill & Ted's Bogus Journey
49.description: A tyrant from the future creates evil android doubles of Bill and Ted and sends them back to eliminate the originals.

50.name: La double vie de Véronique
50.description: Two parallel stories about two identical women; one living in Poland, the other in France. They don't know each other, but their lives are nevertheless profoundly connected.
